Package io.mrshannon.hexmek.models

Class AbstractUnit

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.mrshannon.hexmek.models.AbstractUnit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Damageable, Movable, Originator, Unit
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Mech, Vehicle
    public abstract class AbstractUnit
extends Object
implements Unit
    Abstract unit, providing full implementation of movement methods.
    See Also:
    Unit

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractUnit.UnitMemento
      Memento to save the location and movement state of a unit.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractUnit

        public AbstractUnit​(String type,
                    char id,
                    Hex hex,
                    Direction facing,
                    MovementFactory movementFactory)
        Construct a new unit.
        Parameters:
        type - type of unit
        id - identification of unit, should be unique to each unit
        hex - starting hex coordinate
        facing - initial facing direction
        movementFactory - factory to use to construct movement strategies

      • save

        public Memento save()
        Save the current location and movement state of the unit.
        This does not save damage or ammo state as it is only intended to for use in the movement phase.
        Specified by:
        save in interface Originator
        Returns:
        a memento containing the current state
